DefaultEvent.Description: You stumble through a mounting haze of dread. The light tears at you. Thoughts wither like charring paper. Across, into the merely brilliant light of inner Frostfound.
DefaultEvent.Name: An acid dazzle

ChildBranches.Name: Cross the bridge
ChildBranches.Description: The light will erode what you are. [This will sacrifice one point of Pages.]

ChildBranches.Name: Return to the Corridors of Frostfound

DefaultEvent.Description: You stumble through a mounting haze of dread. The light tears at you. But you have the sun in your pocket. Across, into the merely brilliant light of inner Frostfound.
DefaultEvent.Name: The New Sequence

ChildBranches.Name: Cross the bridge
ChildBranches.Description: You have the sun in your pocket.

DefaultEvent.Description: What is this light? There is no sun below. A trick, an illusion. Frostfound is nothing real.
DefaultEvent.Name: Brittle brilliance

Description: A narrow space of blinding light, all colours and none, between the towers of Brite and the towers of Teneb. Once on the Bridge, you will be exposed, like an insect in the desert, like a fresh carcass on the operating table, like a jewel in the sun.
Name: The Diamond Bridge
